extendedInfo.description: Motion Spy Video Recorder is the ONLY professional HD video recorder that triggers on motion detection. Built using 10+ years of imaging technology expertise, this app brings robust, professional grade motion detection technology to your phone. Just start the app and position your phone and motion-triggered video clips will be recorded. You can choose to get instant notifications by email with before and after pictures or text/SMS when motion is detected. And all this happens while your phone appears turned off.The free version is ad supported and has limits on the video clips you can record but all other options work.Features:â¢ One touch operation to setup up motion detector â¢ Option to adjust the sensitivity of the motion detectorâ¢ Full HD video recording if your device supports itâ¢ Instant email with before and after pictures and text/SMS notification. Custom sender email option for complete privacyâ¢ During monitoring and video recording device appears turned offâ¢ Change launcher icon so the app is completely discreetâ¢ Option to play alarm sound when motion detectedâ¢ Choose internal or external SD card for storing videosâ¢ Hide videos from Galleryâ¢ Supports front and back cameraâ¢ Options for delayed / future recordingsUses:â¢ Spy video recordingâ¢ Motion triggered video recorderâ¢ Professional hidden video recorderâ¢ CCTV and security video recordingâ¢ Surveillance cameraâ¢ Secret video recorderâ¢ Infant baby monitorMotion Spy Video Recorder is a spy video recorder for professional or personal video recordings and is the best app available in the Android market for taking motion triggered videos. Please email us on feedback@zeronoiseapps.com with feedback and feature requests. We are committed to top notch customer experience and will respond quickly to feedback and feature requests. If you like our app, please take a minute to rate it on Google Play market.Motion Spy Video Recorder is developed and distributed by Zero Noise Apps. All rights reserved. This app is licensed, not sold. By downloading the app, you accept our EULA available on our website at http://zeronoiseapps.com. App is licensed for individual, private use only. For use by companies, please contact us for corporate license information.

reviews.title: Virus Warning
reviews.comment: Once you install this app you will start getting Android notifications of possible viruses. You can verify this by holding down on the virus notification and selecting the App Info menu. Android will then tell you that the notifications are coming from this app. I\'m deleting this app immediately, it isn\'t worth getting a virus.
